quote: The pursuit of truth does not permit violence on one's opponent.
There is more to life than increasing its speed.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
Justice that love gives is a surrender, justice that law gives is a punishment.
The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
By plucking her petals, you do not gather the beauty of the flower.
Wherever you go becomes a part of you somehow.
If you live on the river, befriend the crocodile.
A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is prerogative of brave.
Nobody can hurt you without your permission.
